questions.question: Is there a large, fully bloomed white rose positioned in the bottom-right area of the image?

questions.question: Is there a pointed arch window with decorative tracery visible on the upper part of the brick building?

questions.question: Are the roses positioned in front of the brick building, creating a clear foreground-background separation?

questions.question: Is there a tall, vertical brick structure (buttress or tower) extending upward on the left side of the building?
